techmeme.title: Microsoft releases a $150 standalone version of Office 2024 for consumers and SMBs, with core app updates and UI changes; the last standalone was Office 2021 (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Philippine President Marcos Jr. signs a law imposing a 12% value-added tax on non-resident digital service providers, including Netflix, HBO, and Disney (Andreo Calonzo/Bloomberg)
Developer Christian Selig says third-party YouTube app Juno for the Vision Pro was "removed from the App Store", after YouTube said it violated its ToS in April (Emma Roth/The Verge)
A profile of Denise Coates, the UK's richest woman, who founded online gambling company Bet365, which had £3B+ in 2023 revenue, as she focuses on a US expansion (Rob Davies/The Guardian)
2024 has been a barren year for big video games compared to 2023, helping indie games take center stage; the games industry has laid off 10,000+ people in 2024 (Tom Faber/Financial Times)
